pli-tv-kd17:5.1.25.pli: Na kho, upāli, bhikkhunī saṅghaṁ bhindati, api ca bhedāya parakkamati, na sikkhamānā saṅghaṁ bhindati …pe…
pli-tv-kd17:5.1.25.en: A nun cannot cause a schism in the Sangha, even if she makes an effort to cause a schism. A trainee nun,

pli-tv-kd17:5.1.26.pli: na sāmaṇero saṅghaṁ bhindati, na sāmaṇerī saṅghaṁ bhindati, na upāsako saṅghaṁ bhindati, na upāsikā saṅghaṁ bhindati, api ca bhedāya parakkamati.
pli-tv-kd17:5.1.26.en: a novice monk, a novice nun, a male lay follower, or a female lay follower cannot cause a schism in the Sangha, even if she makes an effort to cause a schism.

pli-tv-kd17:5.1.27.pli: Bhikkhu kho, upāli, pakatatto, samānasaṁvāsako, samānasīmāyaṁ ṭhito, saṅghaṁ bhindatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd17:5.1.27.en: Only a monk of regular standing, one who belongs to the same Buddhist sect and is present within the same monastic boundary, can cause a schism in the Sangha.”

pli-tv-kd17:5.4.2.pli: “Samaggaṁ kho, upāli, saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhikaṁ kibbisaṁ pasavati, kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatīti.
pli-tv-kd17:5.4.2.en: “Anyone who causes a schism in a united Sangha does a bad act with effect for an eon; he’s boiled in hell for an eon.

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.1.pli: “Siyā nu kho, bhante, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho”ti?
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.1.en: “Might one who causes a schism in the Sangha be irredeemably destined to an eon in hell?”

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.3.pli: “Siyā pana, bhante, saṅghabhedako na āpāyiko, na nerayiko, na kappaṭṭho, na atekiccho”ti?
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.3.en: “Might one who causes a schism in the Sangha not be irredeemably destined to an eon in hell?”

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.5.pli: “Katamo pana, bhante, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho”ti?
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.5.en: “What sort of person who causes a schism in the Sangha is irredeemably destined to an eon in hell?”

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.9.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho.
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.9.en: This person who causes a schism in the Sangha is irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.13.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho.
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.13.en: This person, too, who causes a schism in the Sangha is irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.17.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho.
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.17.en: This person, too, who causes a schism in the Sangha is irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.26.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho.
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.26.en: This person, too, who causes a schism in the Sangha is irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.

pli-tv-kd17:5.5.54.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako āpāyiko, nerayiko, kappaṭṭho, atekiccho”ti.
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.54.en: This person, too, who causes a schism in the Sangha is irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.”

pli-tv-kd17:5.6.1.pli: “Katamo pana, bhante, saṅghabhedako na āpāyiko, na nerayiko, na kappaṭṭho, na atekiccho”ti?
pli-tv-kd17:5.6.1.en: “What sort of person who causes a schism in the Sangha isn’t irredeemably destined to an eon in hell?”

pli-tv-kd17:5.6.5.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako na āpāyiko, na nerayiko, na kappaṭṭho, na atekiccho.
pli-tv-kd17:5.6.5.en: This person who causes a schism in the Sangha isn’t irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.

pli-tv-kd17:5.6.10.pli: Ayampi kho, upāli, saṅghabhedako na āpāyiko, na nerayiko, na kappaṭṭho, na atekiccho”ti.
pli-tv-kd17:5.6.10.en: This person, too, who causes a schism in the Sangha isn’t irredeemably destined to an eon in hell.”

an6.87:1.3.pli: Mātā jīvitā voropitā hoti, pitā jīvitā voropito hoti, arahaṁ jīvitā voropito hoti, tathāgatassa duṭṭhena cittena lohitaṁ uppāditaṁ hoti, saṅgho bhinno hoti, duppañño hoti jaḷo eḷamūgo.
an6.87:1.3.en: They murder their mother or father or a perfected one. They maliciously shed the blood of a Realized One. They cause a schism in the Saṅgha. They’re witless, dull, and stupid.

an6.87:2.3.pli: Na mātā jīvitā voropitā hoti, na pitā jīvitā voropito hoti, na arahaṁ jīvitā voropito hoti, na tathāgatassa duṭṭhena cittena lohitaṁ uppāditaṁ hoti, na saṅgho bhinno hoti, paññavā hoti ajaḷo aneḷamūgo.
an6.87:2.3.en: They don’t murder their mother or father or a perfected one. They don’t maliciously shed the blood of a Realized One. They don’t cause a schism in the Saṅgha. They’re wise, bright, and clever.

an1.275:1.1.pli: “Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṁ bhindeyya. Netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
an1.275:1.1.en: “It is impossible, mendicants, it cannot happen for a person accomplished in view to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.

an1.275:1.2.pli: Ṭhānañca kho etaṁ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṁ puthujjano saṅghaṁ bhindeyya. Ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī”ti.
an1.275:1.2.en: But it is possible for an ordinary person to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.”

mn115:13.7.pli: ‘Aṭṭhānametaṁ anavakāso yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṁ bhindeyya, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī’ti pajānāti;
mn115:13.7.en: They understand: ‘It’s impossible for a person accomplished in view to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.

mn115:13.8.pli: ‘ṭhānañca kho etaṁ vijjati yaṁ puthujjano saṅghaṁ bhindeyya, ṭhānametaṁ vijjatī’ti pajānāti.
mn115:13.8.en: But it’s possible for an ordinary person to cause a schism in the Saṅgha.’

an6.94:1.3.pli: Abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo mātaraṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ, abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo pitaraṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ, abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo arahantaṁ jīvitā voropetuṁ, abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo tathāgatassa duṭṭhena cittena lohitaṁ uppādetuṁ, abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo saṅghaṁ bhindituṁ, abhabbo diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisituṁ.
an6.94:1.3.en: A person accomplished in view can’t murder their mother or father or a perfected one. They can’t maliciously shed the blood of the Realized One. They can’t cause a schism in the Saṅgha. They can’t acknowledge another teacher.
